nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Troubleshooting
Unplanned server outage? Need to reset the flag? Disable the schedule trigger, activate these nodes and run the **Reset to Idle** node manually.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content: This updates the flag, indicating, that the workflow is currently running

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Set Interval
Define how frequently the main workflow should run.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content: If the flag stored in Redis already exists and indicates, that the worklow is still running, another execution will be prevented. In that case this workflow ends here.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content:
## Set Workflow ID
Set the ID of the main workflow which should be executed

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content: This checks for a dynamic flag (containing the workflow ID) which represents if the workflow is currently running.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content: This updates the flag, indicating, that the workflow is currently idle

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Executeworkflow Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Executeworkflow Workflow. This workflow integrates 8 different services: filter, stickyNote, scheduleTrigger, redis, executeWorkflow. It contains 17 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 17
- **Node Types**: 8
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Execute Workflow**: executeWorkflow
- **Schedule Trigger**: scheduleTrigger
- **Get Status**: redis
- **Set Running**: redis
- **Set Idle**: redis
- **Continue if Idle**: filter
- **Redis Key exists**: if
- **No Operation**: noOp
- **When clicking "Test workflow"**: manualTrigger
- **Reset to Idle**: redis
- ... and 7 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
